Name: Splash Bash
About the game: Splash Bash is a hectic local multiplayer brawler, where up to 4 players tries to bash each other into the water using physics based gameplay! Key Features / How to play Use your water gun to propel yourself through the air and bash the opponents! Grab the Beach Ball power up to get unlimited water for a short time! Random Accessories. Over 3000 combos! Fast paced gameplay and easy to pick up controls brings you hours of mindless fun! Over 20 levels! DESIGNED FOR CONTROLLERS Limited support for Mouse and Singleplayer against AI.
